title: Why do ADCs think that they can tax other lanes but not let other people cs in theirs?
body:
They can get angry and spam pings at you for taking cs even if they are not in bot lane or dead but you just have to smile and look pretty when they walk up to your lane and last hit the entire wave. Do people seriously think that only ADCs require items to be useful? Newsflash, everyone needs items to be useful.

I don't understand why they keep trying to take farm even when they get full builds too other than for the sake of their grades when their other teammates are still an item or two away from full builds.
